member.name: T:MediaInfoDotNet.MediaFile
member.summary: Represents a media file.

member.name: T:MediaInfoDotNet.Models.GeneralStream
member.summary: For inheritance by classes representing media files.

member.name: T:MediaInfoDotNet.Models.Media
member.summary: Implements features common to all media types.

member.name: M:MediaInfoDotNet.Models.Media.#ctor(MediaInfoLib.MediaInfo,System.Int32)
member.summary: Used to create a stream-specific object, such as an audio stream, for use by an existing MediaFile object.
member.param: The MediaInfo ID for this stream.

member.name: M:MediaInfoDotNet.Models.Media.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes the initial MediaInfo object.
member.param: Complete path and name of a file.

member.name: F:MediaInfoDotNet.Models.Media.kind
member.summary: MediaInfo stream kind.

member.name: M:MediaInfoDotNet.Models.Media.miOption(System.String)
member.summary: Returns information about MediaInfo.

member.name: M:MediaInfoDotNet.Models.Media.miGetString(System.String)
member.summary: Returns a MediaInfo value, "" if error.

member.name: M:MediaInfoDotNet.Models.Media.miGetLong(System.String)
member.summary: Returns a MediaInfo value as a long, 0 if error.

member.name: M:MediaInfoDotNet.Models.Media.miGetInt(System.String)
member.summary: Returns a MediaInfo value as an int, 0 if error.

member.name: M:MediaInfoDotNet.Models.Media.miGetFloat(System.String)
member.summary: Returns a MediaInfo value as a float, 0.0 if error.

member.name: M:MediaInfoDotNet.Models.Media.miGetDouble(System.String)
member.summary: Returns a MediaInfo value as a float, 0.0 if error.

member.name: M:MediaInfoDotNet.Models.Media.miGetDateTime(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Returns a MediaInfo date, Minval if error.

member.name: M:MediaInfoDotNet.Models.Media.isMediaInfoDllCompatible
member.summary: Returns true if MediaInfo.dll is compatible.

member.name: M:MediaInfoDotNet.Models.Media.Finalize
member.summary: Destructor. Disposes of resources.

member.name: M:MediaInfoDotNet.Models.Media.Dispose
member.summary: Ensures resource disposal.

member.name: P:MediaInfoDotNet.Models.Media.filePath
member.summary: Complete path to the current media file.

member.name: P:MediaInfoDotNet.Models.Media.mediaInfo
member.summary: MediaInfo object

member.name: P:MediaInfoDotNet.Models.Media.id
member.summary: MediaInfo ID for this stream kind.

member.summary: GeneralStream constructor.
member.param: Complete path and name of a file.

member.summary: The format or container of this file or stream.

member.summary: The title of this stream.

member.summary: This stream's globally unique ID (GUID).

member.summary: Date and time stream encoding completed.

member.summary: Software used to encode this stream.

member.summary: Media type of stream, formerly called MIME type.

member.name: P:MediaInfoDotNet.Models.GeneralStream.size
member.summary: Size in bytes.

member.summary: Encoder settings used for encoding this stream. String format: name=value / name=value / ...

member.summary: Encoder settings used for encoding this stream.

member.name: P:MediaInfoDotNet.Models.GeneralStream.codecId
member.summary: Codec ID available from some codecs.

member.name: P:MediaInfoDotNet.Models.GeneralStream.codecCommonName
member.summary: Common name of the codec.

member.summary: Stream delay (e.g. to sync audio/video) in ms.

member.name: P:MediaInfoDotNet.Models.GeneralStream.duration
member.summary: Duration of the stream in milliseconds.

member.name: P:MediaInfoDotNet.Models.GeneralStream.encodedBy
member.summary: Name of the person/group who encoded this file.

member.name: P:MediaInfoDotNet.Models.GeneralStream.album
member.summary: Album name, if the file represents an album.

member.name: P:MediaInfoDotNet.Models.GeneralStream.iTunesGrouping
member.summary: The grouping used by iTunes.

member.name: P:MediaInfoDotNet.Models.GeneralStream.iTunesCompilation
member.summary: The compilation used by iTunes.

member.name: P:MediaInfoDotNet.Models.GeneralStream.bitRate
member.summary: Overall bitrate of all streams.

member.name: P:MediaInfoDotNet.Models.GeneralStream.bitRateMaximum
member.summary: Maximum overall bitrate of all streams.

member.name: P:MediaInfoDotNet.Models.GeneralStream.bitRateMinimum
member.summary: Minimum overall bitrate of all streams.

member.name: P:MediaInfoDotNet.Models.GeneralStream.bitRateNominal
member.summary: Maximum allowed overall bitrate of all streams.

member.name: P:MediaInfoDotNet.Models.GeneralStream.videoCount
member.summary: Number of video streams in this file.

member.name: P:MediaInfoDotNet.Models.GeneralStream.audioCount
member.summary: Number of audio streams in this file.

member.name: P:MediaInfoDotNet.Models.GeneralStream.textCount
member.summary: Number of subtitles or other texts in this file.

member.name: P:MediaInfoDotNet.Models.GeneralStream.imageCount
member.summary: Number of images in this file.

member.name: P:MediaInfoDotNet.Models.GeneralStream.otherCount
member.summary: Number of others in this file.

member.name: P:MediaInfoDotNet.Models.GeneralStream.menuCount
member.summary: Number of menu streams in this file.

member.summary: The minimum bitrate of this stream in BPS.

member.summary: Mode (CBR, VBR) used for bit allocation.

member.summary: The total number of frames (e.g. video frames).

member.summary: Frame rate of the stream in frames per second.

member.summary: Compression mode (lossy or lossless).

member.name: P:MediaInfoDotNet.Models.AudioStream.compressionRatio
member.summary: Ratio of current size to uncompressed size.

member.name: P:MediaInfoDotNet.Models.AudioStream.language
member.summary: 2-letter (if available) or 3-letter ISO code.

member.name: P:MediaInfoDotNet.Models.AudioStream.channels
member.summary: Number of audio channels, e.g. 6 for 5.1 audio.

member.name: P:MediaInfoDotNet.Models.AudioStream.sampleRate
member.summary: Audio sample rate, e.g. 44100 for CD audio.
